content:
/>
X.ii.6.G.1.i
.
Preparing the Rating Decision for Insurance Purposes
When preparing the rating decision for insurance purposes,
prepare a copy of the rating for the IC
under the
Decision
, show
Incompetency for insurance purposes
[is] [is not]
established
show the Veteran’s address, including the zip code, above the
Jurisdiction
section
dispose of any contentions included in the IC’s request for determination that are symptoms of an evaluated disability by a statement to this effect in the
Narrative
part of the rating decision, and
in the coded conclusion, show the codes and evaluations appropriate to compensation entitlement.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section G - Competency Determinations for the Insurance Center (IC)
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section G
